ISSUE.TITLE: Shopizer-oracle : Getting 404 while on-click event of newly created category
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In Oracle setup, Once we add the category from shopizer admin it is available on shopizer web portal. But when we surf the added category for the products available within it at that time we are getting error page. Please find attached back-end logs and the screen shot of shopizer web portal. Below is the query which is getting failed, when added category is clicked. Error Query (Bind Index parameter value (:CID = 1) select categories, count(product.id) from Product product inner join product.categories categories where categories.id in (:cid) and product.available=true and product.dateAvailable<=:dt group by categories.id --- ![shopizer-error-page](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68943661/98813015-8b1bce80-2449-11eb-8218-208d048f3b00.png) [backend-error.log](https://github.com/shopizer-ecommerce/shopizer/files/5524009/backend-error.log)
